fullContent: Homeâ€º GirlParadise GirlsBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenParadise Girls is a 2D dress up game where the player tries to prepare the two best friends for their dreamy beach holiday. You can imagine how excited they might be. They have been waiting for the holiday season for a long time. And that moment has come. It's your mission to get them ready for the beach. Welcome to the colorful world of summer fashion in one of the best dress up games with stunning bikinis!How to Play Paradise GirlsEnter the game and start preparing the girls by clicking directly on them. You will prepare them in rows. This preparation is a 4-stage process, preparing each girl in 2 stages. Start by doing their makeup first, then decide on their bikinis! Then they can go to the beach and hang out in all their elegance.Light MakeupDeciding on makeup they can use in the summer heat may be more pleasant. Light makeup will not cause the makeup to run off the face due to sweat.You can start to do their makeup by choosing a lipstick color. The tone of each lipstick is chirpy.Then, choose an eyeshadow color from a vibrant palette. Here, you will find shades of black, green, pink, orange, brown and blue.Eyebrow and HairstyleIt's up to you to determine their eyebrow shape and hairstyle. It is possible to find beautiful shapes here; lots of choices exist. You can also determine their hair and eyebrow colors according to their makeup tone.Vibrant Swimwear SelectionYou can find many colorful swimsuits and bikinis here. Choose from sporty or low-cut ones.You are free to choose whichever bikini or swimsuit you want them to wear according to your mood.Then, complement their bikinis with cool glasses and straw hats. Wearing a straw hat is a must under the sizzling sun. They are now ready for that wonderful summer holiday!ControlsUse your mouse click to dress up the paradise girls.Discover Other Girl GamesIf you found playing Paradise Girls enjoyable, you may try Witch Beauty Salon. It's another dress up game in which you play as a stylist for a witch with origins dating back to the 13th century. It's your job to make sure she looks her best during a witch party! Make her the deadliest creature among the witches by using all of your creativity.Or, you may look up the girl games tag on OnlineGames.io for more alternatives.
